    • Are you ready to take your career to the next level?

    TalentUp Africa is a hybrid between an education provider and a recruitment firm that provides you with the tools, skills, and opportunities to enter the workforce
    Find A Job Looking to Hire

    Working to empower Africa’s biggest assets. It's talent

    TalentUp Africa utilizes an ecosystem benefiting both youth and hiring organizations to address the wide-spread skills and job mismatches in Sub-Saharan Africa. Save time & focus on hiring the best talent

    Professional CV

    Use our intuitive mobile template to build and download your professional CV in five simple steps.

    Jobs Board

    We work toward placing 100% of our graduates in fulltime positions 90 days after completing our program.

    QUIZ & Assessments

    Identify Africa’s top talent and enroll them talent in a leadership program focusing on skills development

    Leadership Academy

    Increase efficiency, lower costs, and grow with a data-driven platform that evolves with your customers.

    Recruitment, made simple

    Our programs are industry-specific, TalentUp Africa lets you recruit efficiently, nurture candidates, and hire top talents.
    Find A Job

    We exist to empower talents in Africa.

    We draw on candidates’ background information and CV, complemented by assessment scores to identify Africa’s top talent and enroll them talent in six-week leadership program focusing on hard and soft skills development.
    Find A Job

    Our vision is to solve Sub-Saharan Africa's crippling skills gaps.

    Our programs are industry-specific, and we will work toward placing each graduate at an appropriate organization.
